CustomField.description: For IMIT grant that requires city council approval i.e. greater than 150M grant can only be Approved if City council's approval document has been uploaded.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For IMIT grant that requires city council approval i.e. greater than 150M grant can only be Approved if City council's approval document has been uploaded.
CustomField.label: City Council's Approval Doc Uploaded
